member.summary: Adds the danger range according to the Goal Value (i.e., Lesser than Goal Value is considered to be in danger).
member.param: The starting value of the Danger range
The mark is the Goal value(i.e., The end value of Danger Range)

member.summary: Adds the safer range according to the Goal Value (i.e., Greater than Goal Value is considered to be safer).
member.param: The mark is the Goal value
